overview:
Mary is a co-founder of RebelVox and leads product development and intellectual property efforts.

Mary was a founding partner and CEO of Panttaja Consulting Group Inc. (PCGi), a 40-person advanced technology consultancy, which was acquired by Netcentives. At Netcentives, she was Vice President of Program Management establishing business and operational processes for the start-up phase of the Custom Loyalty product lines, which grew to be a major source of the company’s revenue. Mary has a BA from the University of California, Berkeley.
